data.title: Integrity - Respect - Excellence
data.meta_description: Our purpose is to fulfill the wishes and needs of the families of Prince Edward Island by providing dignified and meaningful funeral ceremonies, crea
data.text:
Welcome to Hillsboro Funeral Home

Our purpose is to fulfill the wishes and needs of the families of Prince Edward Island by providing dignified and meaningful funeral ceremonies, creating a lasting tribute with compassion and grace. Every life is worth celebrating and we are committed to provide services with integrity, respect and excellence.

Our staff of professionally trained, licensed funeral directors and embalmers are passionate about helping families in their time of need and can accommodate a wide spectrum of services, from the simplest celebration of life to full traditional funerals.

The foundation of our relationship with families is trust. Our on-site crematorium guarantees your loved one is treated with respect and integrity and never leaves our care at any time until they are laid to rest or returned to your care.

Our goal is to invest back into our community and create relationships through community involvement and supporting local.

Our funeral professionals provide caring guidance in "Helping you plan for tomorrow, today". Whether you are looking for funeral information, wishing to preplan funeral services or are in need of our immediate services, we are here to assist you.
